==English==

===Pronunciation===
{{rfap}}
* {{a|UK}} {{IPA|/tɹʌmp/}}, {{SAMPA|/tr\Vmp/}}
*: {{rhymes|ʌmp}}

===Etymology 1===
possibly from [[triumph]]

====Noun====
{{en-noun}}

# {{US|singular}} The [[suit]], in a [[game]] of [[cards]], that [[outrank]]s all others.
# {{British|in plural}} The [[suit]], in a [[game]] of [[cards]], that [[outrank]]s all others.
#: ''Diamonds were declared '''trumps'''.''
# A [[playing card]] of that suit.
#: ''He played an even higher '''trump'''.''
# {{figurative}} Something that gives one an [[advantage]], especially one held in [[reserve]].

=====Translations=====
{{trans-top|suit that outranks all others}}
* Albanian: {{t+|sq|atu|xs=Albanian}}
* Czech: {{t-|cs|trumfy|m|p}}
* Dutch: [[troef]]
* German: {{t+|de|Trumpf|m}}
{{trans-mid}}
* Hungarian: {{t+|hu|adu}}, {{t|hu|tromf}}
* Portuguese: trunfo ((m))
* Spanish: {{t|es|pinte|m}},  {{t|es|triunfo|m}}
{{trans-bottom}}

{{trans-top|playing card of that suit}}
* Albanian: {{t+|sq|atu|xs=Albanian}}
* Czech: {{t-|cs|trumf|m}}
* Dutch: [[troef]]
* Finnish: {{t-|fi|valttikortti}}
* French: {{t+|fr|atout}}
{{trans-mid}}
* German: {{t+|de|Trumpf|m}}
* Portuguese: trunfo (m)
* Slovene: {{t-|sl|adut}}
* Spanish: {{t|es|pinte|m}},  {{t|es|triunfo|m}}
{{trans-bottom}}

{{trans-top|something that gives one an advantage}}
* Albanian: {{t+|sq|atu|xs=Albanian}}
* Czech: {{t-|cs|trumf|m}}
* Dutch: [[troef]]
{{trans-mid}}
* Finnish: {{t-|fi|valtti}}
* German: {{t+|de|Trumpf|m}}
* Portuguese: trunfo ((m))
{{trans-bottom}}

====Verb====
{{en-verb}}

# {{transitive}} To play a trump (on a card of another suit).
#: ''He knew the hand was lost when his ace was '''trumped'''.''
# {{intransitive}} To [[play]] a trump, or to take a [[trick]] with a trump; to [[ruff]].
# {{transitive}} To [[get the better of]], or [[finesse]], a [[competitor]].
# {{transitive}} To [[supersede]].
#: ''In this election, it would seem issues of national security '''trumped''' economic issues.''

=====Translations=====
{{trans-top|To play a trump, or to take a trick with a trump; to ruff}}
{{trans-mid}}
{{trans-bottom}}

{{trans-top|To get the better of, or finesse, a competitor}}
* Finnish: [[päihittää]]
{{trans-mid}}
{{trans-bottom}}

=====Derived terms=====
* [[the last trump]]
* [[no trump]]
* [[over trump]]
* [[trump card]]
* [[trump out]]
* [[trump up]]
* [[under trump]]

===Etymology 2===
{{etyl|enm}} [[trompe]]

====Noun====
'''trump'''

# {{obsolete}} A [[trumpet]].
